entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with rain showers or flurries at times heavy changing to flurries at times heavy this afternoon. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 late this morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
